ChannelId.description: The canonical (synthetic) Xfuze channel id, if the channel is identifiable, format Channel_[sourceSystem]_[ChannelNumber] e.g Channel_D365_012

ChannelKey.description: The native channel number from source, if the channel is identifiable e.g 012

ChannelKeyType.description: The type of the channel number e.g Store, DC etc

ChannelClass.description: The native channel number from source, if the channel is identifiable e.g Concessions

ChannelCode.description: The unique code of the channel where the transaction occurred e.g Web, Retail

ChannelPurpose.description: The purpose of the channel usage e.g Sales, Return, Collection

ChannelType.description: The class e.g Selling and type e.g B2B, B2C, Partner of the channel

ChannelName.description: The name of the channel e.g John Lewis Concession

TouchPoint.description: The touch-point 'system' details of the channel interaction

ReasonDesc.description: The reason desc for this channel

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
